<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> a3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.46</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the select color of the of the secondary text (right aligned) of the item with the given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user [[dialog]] to color.
<br>
Colour is in format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lbSetSelectColorRight]]  [idc, index, color] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, color]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> color: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[lbSetSelectColorRight]] [index, color] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, color]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> color: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSetSelectColorRight]] [101, 0, [0, 1, 0, 0.5]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetSelectColorRight]] [0, [0, 1, 0, 0.5]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
